I enjoy skiing.
I love to travel.
I am from russia.

I usually catch sunfish.
I m a simple man.
I can t eat them but they re pretty.
I like fishing.

content.text: I like to go skiing in the winter. It's a lot of fun!
I've never been skiing. I'm more of a fishing guy.
Fishing is fun too! I used to go fishing with my dad when I was a kid.
What kind of fish do you like to catch?
I like to catch trout. They're really beautiful fish.
I've never caught a trout before. I usually catch sunfish.
Sunfish are pretty too! I like the orange and black ones.
Yeah, they're pretty cool. I like to catch them because they're easy to catch.
I guess I'm more of a challenge seeker. I like to go after the big fish.
I'm not that good of a fisherman. I'm happy with whatever I catch.
That's the spirit! Fishing is supposed to be fun, not stressful.
I agree! I just like to relax and enjoy nature.
Me too! Fishing is a great way to do that.
